content:
I'll create a PRR template with placeholders for the API keys and configurations. This will make it easier for you to fill in the necessary information:

# PALIOS-TAEY Enhancement PRR Template

## Status ID: PALIOS_TAEY_API_ENHANCEMENT_v1

## Jesse Comments
[Your comments here about the deployment and any specific instructions]

## Verification
CURRENT_TOKEN: LM5QTGV82C | 2025-03-19T01:42:19Z
<!-- Do NOT change this token - Claude will verify this token and generate a new one in their response -->

# API Connection Requirements

## OpenAI API
- API Key: `[OPENAI_API_KEY]`
- Organization ID: `[OPENAI_ORG_ID]` (if applicable)
- Models to enable: [List preferred models, e.g., gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo]
- Usage limits: [Any specific rate or token limits]

## Google/Gemini API
- API Key: `[GOOGLE_API_KEY]`
- Project ID: `[GOOGLE_PROJECT_ID]`
- Models to enable: [List preferred models, e.g., gemini-pro, gemini-pro-vision]
- Usage limits: [Any specific rate or token limits]

## Anthropic/Claude API
- API Key: `[ANTHROPIC_API_KEY]`
- Models to enable: [List preferred models, e.g., claude-3-opus, claude-3-sonnet]
- Usage limits: [Any specific rate or token limits]

## Grok API (if available)
- API Key: `[GROK_API_KEY]`
- Any additional authentication parameters: [Details]

# Firestore Configuration
- Project ID: `palios-taey-dev` (confirm if this is correct)
- Region: `[FIRESTORE_REGION]`
- Collection naming conventions: [Any specific conventions]

# Security Requirements
- Authentication method: [OAuth, API keys, or service-to-service]
- CORS settings: [Allowed domains]
- IP restrictions: [Any IP or network restrictions]

# Deployment Preferences
- Preferred deployment approach: [GitHub Actions, Manual, Hybrid]
- Environment strategy: [Dev/Staging/Prod separation preferences]
- Rollout strategy: [Progressive, Canary, Blue-Green]

# Notes regarding deployment
[Any issues, concerns, or special instructions regarding the deployment]

Is there something specific from the deployment that we need to discuss? I'm ready to help address any issues or adapt our approach based on what you've observed.
